title: Disable direct share
content: Old contacts that I do NOT want to see are showing up as suggested contacts when i try to share a link or something. I hate seeing these people show up. I haven't shared anything with them in a really long time and it brings back bad memories. I don't see a way to turn off direct share in my settings and some of the contacts that are suggested, I haven't even interacted with as much as others that do not show up!
